domain.name: Person

domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

entity.name: Hunt and Johnson's final public debate
entity.description: The Conservative leadership hopefuls are being grilled by readers of The Sun newspaper. It is the pair's last chance to debate each other in front of the general public before polls close. One of the two candidates will be named the prime minister of the UK within the next week.

text: @BorisJohnson You told people to travel as far as the like you told people to enjoy the sun. The people did tavel the people did enjoy the sun. I hope there is no #secondwave because the blood will be on your hands #covid19
